name: Childrens Quest & Brain Logic!
description:
Get ready for adventures! Open all rooms in the house, complete missions and solve quests!
Think hard over the puzzles, fix attentively and make experiments to succeed.

Fixies are small creatures that live in home appliances and fix them. They are calling all kids to try a role of a detective and solve quests!
There are two types of gameplay: «find objects and fix» and «quest».
In the «quest» mode you will have missions from the Fixies. To succeed them you will need to complete a chain of actions like find objects, put them into right places, think logically to make things work, find codes and other.
There is so much new for kids to learn about the world around! Play thoughtfully and they will be able to tell how a metal detector works and where to use a screwdriver!

The game has difficulty levels so even the little ones can play with tips from the Fixies characters.

Explore all the corners of the house, feed the fish and fix the remote control. The game will be interesting for those who love learning new, adore logical puzzles and ready to experiment!

If you have any questions, send us an email: contact.devgame@gmail.com
